meanings.definition: Used as an expletive or mild swear word.
meanings.sent3: Dadgum, I forgot my lunch at home again.
meanings.sent4: The dadgum rain ruined our picnic plans.
meanings.sent5: The loud dadgum startled the sleeping cat.

meanings.definition: Used as an intensifier or expression of frustration.
meanings.sent1: She ran dadgum fast to catch the bus.
meanings.sent2: I am dadgum tired after a long day at work.
meanings.sent3: Trying to untangle the cords was a dadgum mess.
meanings.sent4: The traffic was moving dadgum slow today.
meanings.sent5: The dadgum heat made it unbearable to stay outside.
